properties.areaDesc: Atlantic Waters of Puerto Rico AND USVI from 10 NM to 19.5N
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 4 at 4:12AM AST until February 5 at 2:00AM AST by NWS San Juan PR
properties.description:
...HAZARDOUS SEAS EXPECTED ACROSS THE ATLANTIC OFFSHORE WATERS...

.A small northerly swell spreading across the Atlantic waters
will generate hazardous seas through late tonight.

* WHAT...Seas between 5 to 7 feet with occasional seas up to 9
feet.

* WHERE...Atlantic Offshore Waters of Puerto Rico and USVI from
10 NM to 19.5N.

* WHEN...From this morning to 2 AM AST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 2 AM AST WEDNESDAY
